session.objective: Create v0.4.0 framework extraction plan, ADR-045, and GitHub milestone/epic

serenaInit.evidence: mcp__serena__initial_instructions called; read memory-index, usage-mandatory, roadmap-priorities, adrs-architecture-decision-records, project-labels-milestones, claude-code-plugin-marketplaces

relevantMemoriesSearched.evidence: Read memory-index, usage-mandatory, roadmap-priorities, adrs-architecture-decision-records, project-labels-milestones, claude-code-plugin-marketplaces from Serena

sessionEndChecklistComplete.evidence: All deliverables created, ADR review completed with 6-agent debate

serenaMemoryUpdated.evidence: Analyst agent wrote adr-045-feasibility-blockers memory to Serena

scopedMarkdownlintRun.evidence: Pre-commit hook runs markdownlint on staged .md files

allChangesCommitted.evidence: All planning artifacts, ADR, critique, security review, and session log committed

workLog.description: Read v0.3.1 migration plan for format reference and existing ADRs to determine next available number
workLog.outcome: ADR-044 was highest; used ADR-045 for framework extraction. v0.3.1 format adopted for PLAN.md

workLog.description: Created comprehensive v0.4.0 PLAN.md with 6 phases, 4 plugins, dependency charts
workLog.outcome: Plan at .agents/projects/v0.4.0/PLAN.md with Mermaid flowchart, Gantt timeline, inventory, risks

workLog.description: Created ADR-045 for Framework Extraction via Plugin Marketplace
Created GitHub milestone v0.4.0 and epic issue structure
Ran mandatory 6-agent ADR review debate per CLAUDE.md constraint
workLog.outcome: Consolidated verdict: NEEDS-REVISION (5 of 6), 1 BLOCK. 9 P0 issues, 10 P1 issues identified

decisions: ADR number: ADR-045 (next available after ADR-044)
Plugin count: 4 plugins (core-agents, framework-skills, session-protocol, quality-gates)
Path abstraction: ${CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT} internal, env vars for consumer paths
Versioning: awesome-ai starts at v0.4.0 aligned with ai-agents milestone
ADR status: Proposed (not Accepted) pending Round 2 review after P0 fixes

learnings.insight: 6-agent debate identified 9 P0 issues including supply chain security, false coupling claims, and 50% session estimate underestimation
learnings.application: Always run ADR review before accepting forward-looking architecture decisions

learnings.insight: v0.3.1 prerequisite creates 11-month delay (ends Jan 2027) that must be explicitly stated in v0.4.0 timeline
learnings.application: Cross-reference prerequisite timelines when creating dependent plans
